newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia palm olein stable in late trade.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia palm olein stable in late trade.

text.p: Indonesian palm olein prices were mostly stable in late trading on Monday, with the absence of fresh leads keeping the market quiet, traders said.
They said palm olein was quoted at 1,370-75 rupiah/kg in Jakarta, unchanged from the opening, but trades were also heard at 1,365 rupiah. Crude palm oil was last done at 1,175 rupiah.
"There was not much business for me today," one trader said. "Demand was not there and a dull day in Malaysia did not help. Buyers are waiting for fresh leads."
Another trader said a crude palm oil tender on Tuesday in the North Sumatran city of Medan should give some direction.
